commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basbd62c12"

diff:
"bd62c12 fix for bug #315167.  purple tab arrow flashes if cursor is put on it.  stole this fix from jag's fix for the suite.  r=mconnor VS: ----------------------------------------------------------------------
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 8e4c924..ba6f55d 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@
       <xul:tabbox anonid="tabbox" flex="1" eventnode="document" xbl:inherits="handleCtrlPageUpDown"
                   onselect="if (!('updateCurrentBrowser' in this.parentNode) || event.target.localName != 'tabpanels') return; this.parentNode.updateCurrentBrowser();">
         <xul:hbox class="tab-drop-indicator-bar">
-          <xul:hbox class="tab-drop-indicator"/>
+          <xul:hbox class="tab-drop-indicator" mousethrough="always"/>
         </xul:hbox>
         <xul:hbox class="tabbrowser-strip" collapsed="true" tooltip="_child" context="_child"
                   anonid="strip"
"
